column1: :Lockwood West plays the role of Dwalin.
:Carl Hague is uncredited as the voice of Dwalin.
:Dwalin is omitted; Thorin is the only companion of the player

column2: who is not seen in the game (other than cut-scenes) until Lake-town.

column1: 2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:
:Dwalin is a non-playable character who is lord of Thorins Halls. The player can find him sitting on a throne north of the gates into Thorins Hall.
